price: 8. Tikrai, tie, kurie tiki (Allaho Vienumą ir Jo Pasiuntinį Muchammedą ﷺ – islamiškąjį monoteizmą) ir daro teisingus gerus darbus, jiems bus nesibaigiantis atlygis, kuris niekad neišseks (t. y. Rojus).
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum ajrun ghayru mamnūnin
